titleStmt.title: Nordens preparatiue to his Speculum Britanniæ. Intended a reconciliation of sundrie propositions by diuers person tendred, concerning the same.
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

notesStmt.note: Concerns criticisms of the first part of his "Speculum Britanniae".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
